title: Delicate Diamond Dangler Earrings - Modern Jhumka Style
materials: GH Color). Features a high-luster finish characteristic of Hyderabadi Polish.
features: Elegant linear design with delicate gold chains suspending sparkling diamond clusters. The design incorporates subtle floral motifs at the chain ends, reminiscent of traditional South Indian temple jewelry, yet maintains a contemporary aesthetic. Secure lever-back closures.
colors: Warm yellow gold paired with the dazzling white brilliance of diamonds.
occasions: Perfect for both everyday wear and special occasions. Suited for modern celebrations
or adding a touch of elegance to traditional attire for events like half-saree functions (paavadai davani) or family gatherings.
description: Combines contemporary design with subtle South Indian influences. The high-quality diamonds provide exceptional sparkle, while the lightweight design ensures comfortable wear. Exquisitely crafted with Hyderabadi polish for lasting brilliance. A versatile piece that can be dressed up or down.
